title: Dragon in Disguise
description: A dead father’s quest, two handsome strangers; life would never be the same. Merah followed the quest her late father left her all the way to Blue Creek. A town with hidden secrets. Some that were her own. But the one thing she never expected was them. A night of pleasure to forget the past turns into so much more. Hunter and Austin, marked as unfulfilled mates, settled in Blue Creek to solve an unusual mission. They never expected to find a sassy mouthed, red-headed bombshell. Nor did they expect that their missions would collide. With Merah’s life in danger from an unknown assailant, they all need to find answers. The time for secrets is over. But sometimes telling all just causes more problems.
author: T.B. Mann
